title: My GF is shy but I love her artwork and wanted to share this...
body: She hates showing people what she's been working on even though I think it's awesome. She's always trying to improve her artwork and doesn't ever think she's good enough to share what she's been doing, but I am a particular fan of this because I think it looks brilliant and she's gone all-out, and I wanted to share with you all for any League/pokemon fans out there!

replies.body: May I recommend to your GF, the speech ["The Gap" by Ira Glass](https://vimeo.com/85040589).  Keep on practicing, and you can close the gap between what you make, and what you wish you could make :)
http://cdn1.theodysseyonline.com/files/2015/07/24/635733145480420056-1345684846_tumblr_npa1rpyY591s3y9slo1_500.gif This one mgiht work
Don't let your memes be dreams.
Don't let you dreams be memes.
Make your memes come true!
Thanks, I've sent that onto her! Didn't expect a Rioter to pick up on this but I know she'll appreciate the encouragement!
Trainer Annie and Snorlax-Tibbers!  Love this!  Tell her to keep drawing -- drawing something every day, working on things like fundamental anatomy and studying styles she admires go a LONG way!

What if instead it was ~~Gym Leader~~ Boss Battle Annie.

This orginal artwork is really good! but I can also see Annie with a cap and wearing a collection of badges and tibbers making some sort of star trek noise when he is summoned.
The Boss theme already has a Mid and Support, what Niche could Annie fill? Also, Sweetheart Annie skin last Valentine's day, there are champions that fit better thematically and need it more.

I thought it was typhlosion.

They are just kinda like fat/skinny versions of eachother aren't they.
I passed this on and she's trying to find herself some inspiration for more lifelike drawing to get better at it ^.^
THIS IS GARBAGE YO

> [{quoted}](name=WLANWPS,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=QGyGawoE,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2015-08-12T02:14:41.404+0000)
>
> THIS IS GARBAGE YO

I'd have to agree, there's room for **major** _improvement._ The figures look to stiff and abnormally placed.
The Pokemon idea is lame af and over used. Annie's hands look like playdough, and she looks like a anorexia patient.
Is yr gf like 13?  

The background itself is just shit.

I don't understand how artwork like this gets so much praise when I see amazing pieces get like 11 upvotes at best.

I can get the feeling of "man wish these talented artists got more reprieve" but holy shit. This person who drew this might be that next GREAT artist. If you want to see more of those artists, dont come around here with your virtol dude. And as an artist, I know criticism is ESSENTIAL. but not outright, pure, unfiltered, assholery. 

I agree this might not be the most dynamic in positions, or its composistion. But its sure as hell better than some of us when we were starting out.

Instead of spewing hatred and pure venom on young or new artists, why do you help them and get them to be those artists. Instead of saying "this sucks you composistion sucks." say, "your composition could use some work try _____!" Because I KNOW, you were a young artist who had some pretty 'shitty' work. We all did, so get off of your high horse and stay humble. Either do that, or go back to your own work and keep your mouth shut. 

No one likes an artist who talks shit and gives NOTHING in return.

Best, 
- Literally **EVERY** artist who started somewhere.

> [{quoted}](name=Obokuri,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=QGyGawoE,comment-id=001300000000,timestamp=2015-08-12T03:56:19.695+0000)
>
> I can get the feeling of "man wish these talented artists got more reprieve" but holy shit. This person who drew this might be that next GREAT artist. If you want to see more of those artists, dont come around here with your virtol dude. And as an artist, I know criticism is ESSENTIAL. but not outright, pure, unfiltered, assholery. 
> 
> I agree this might not be the most dynamic in positions, or its composistion. But its sure as hell better than some of us when we were starting out.
> 
> Instead of spewing hatred and pure venom on young or new artists, why do you help them and get them to be those artists. Because I KNOW, you were a young artist who had some pretty 'shitty' work. We all did, so get off of your high horse and stay humble. Either do that, or go back to your own work and keep your mouth shut. 
> 
> No one likes an artist who talks shit and gives NOTHING in return.
> 
> Best, 
> - Literally **EVERY** artist who started somewhere.

Whoa Whoa Whoa calm yourself, unlike you lot I'm giving an **HONEST** opinion of the piece.
Empathy upvotes are garbage in improving the artist will get absolutely **NO WHERE** without constructive criticism.
If she doesn't know what she's doing wrong she can't fix it, if you can't handle negative comments about your art then you're not a true artist. As someone who draws I've had my fair share of people telling my art is straight up shit and it's those people who helped me to improve. If you need others praise to draw then idk.

But I won't sit here and lie to the gal like you kissups.

"No one likes an artist who talks shit and gives NOTHING in return."

Ah I give nothing? oh okay honey what do you give? Get off your horse white knight.

You're an artist, or at least you sound like it. 

Pointing out what is wrong in a drawing is and providing NO SOLUTIONS TO THE PROBLEM. Is lazy critique. As an artist (and as an artist who is providing critique) you have a duty to help them grow, or help them understand what they need to work on. You can blunt, you can even be a bit crass. But when you are blunt and crass and you provide no solution to help them, all you're doing is being a bad artist in a community.

But, what you I can tell already that you are not going to change how you work in a community, I'm going to go and leave you to provide nothing. 

peace and love bruh 

<3 have a good life

Cheers, this is basically the exact reason she doesn't want to share. Because she draws in her free time when the mood takes her and because she enjoys it, not to try and please others, and knows well enough that her art is far from perfect without being exposed to this sort of unhelpful vitriol.

I am genuinely interested in seeing your drawings!  Not to mock or deride you, but because I think the things people can do are sometimes amazing and it's possible to get inspiration from other people's art, even if it's not my idea of what it **could** be.
That's so cute! I've wanted a Pokemon Trainer Annie skin for so long. Personally I'd prefer an Ursaring rather than a Snorlax, but it's still super cute! Your girlfriend has talent c:

I like her work! There's of course room for improvement, but I really like Tibbers as a Snorlax. Now sure i've seen him as that particular pokemon before. Love the Houndour, Vulpix, and Darumaka in the background too. Are those some of her favourite pokemon, or does she just like fire types?

She just felt that fire types were the best pokemon for Annie to have. Those three represent the basic Annie spells, while Tibberslax is a Snorlax because that's my pet name, so she likes to draw Snorlaxes XD While there are other pokemon that work for a demon bear I like the idea of a demon Snorlax as they're usually rather placid.
{{champion:22}}  Catchum
SNOORLAAX
But..that IS good enough to share :O
I would pay good money for Pokemon-themed Annie skin where she throws out different pokemon as Tibbers each time.
Is that Poke-Tibbers and Annie Catchum?

She was going more for Annie as one of Ash's many tagalongs (Apparently all of his female partners have triangles on them somewhere which is why she has hair clips).

And it's a tibberslax. It's like a Snorlax, but with a more fiery temper.

i wasnt getting that specific, but i get the idea :P

Tibbelax

Snorbers


Man i dont know....professor Oak will have to solve this one.

Annie would likley be a team "plasma" or whatever final boss though...shes too evil to run with ash i think
Whatever he is, if he blocks my path Im not gonna try and wake him up.
ROFL! Yeah i think ill just learn to swim across the damn river this time :P

how can professor oak figure this out when he can't even remember his grandsons own name
I'm sorry but Tibbelax is now in my headcanon of in-game brands along with Graggy Ice and Sivir's Clothes. "The laxative with the strength of a BEAR ON FIRE"
there you have it folks...Tibbelax, legendary laximon!
Tibblax and Annie Catchum.
Not having confidence and yet putting that much effort into pieces takes perseverance. I tend to give up on things half way through because I start to think it looks bad =x Super cute drawing :D
Looks pretty nice, but why it's another manga. Srsly why fanart is ALWAYS manga?
Should be ursaring

This skin would probably get me to play Annie for the first time in over 4 years. Looks great!

I am pretty shy about my artwork too, but if she shares her artwork more she will get good feedback! 
I started sharing mine with friends I play league with and they have been supportive, and even Rioters like the ones here and Kindlejack love to see the artwork you share.

Yeah she's great with constructive criticism but she doesn't trust the internet not to tear her a new one because someone thinks they're the next Picasso. I keep telling her how supportive and complimentary the Community Creations board is though!

Tell her I think it's great please, I am just getting back into art after a long hiatus and I have a great time seeing art pieces like these on the boards. Some of these so called "artists" giving "criticism" need to be told they are terrible people. You do not insult art. I was talking about how terrible the comments are on this post to my bf, when a couple days ago I saw a sketch that was getting tons of positive comments. It's obvious to me that a lot of time and effort was put into this. It makes me sad that art that takes 20m at most is praised, when pieces like this(can I know how long it took please?) are bashed to smithereens. Both should be given compliments, more effort should equal more so. Constructive criticism should be given if- and only if- asked for. O well. I'd love to see more of her art. :)

Thank you so much! I'll pass this onto her for sure! Off the top of my head she finished today, and started maybe Wednesday last week, however she didn't work on it Saturday-Monday as she had other stuff going on. So several hours on it over that period of time.

Overall this is a really good looking piece, I personally wish I could draw half has well as your girlfriend but I can barely do stick figures but I do have a girlfriend that also draws and sketches. With more practice I am absolutely sure that your girlfriend will be drawing pieces of art that people will love. Or at least she will feel confident enough to share it with more people. Lots of luck!
Shy? The god of Riven in korea? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) well i didn't know that shy is a grill
great :D

Well congrats to your shy gf on her red post! Plus i think we all like snoarlax tibbers although a few copyright protection changes would be a good call. My gf is shy too so she won't draw my idea. Maybe yours willhttp://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/O9cs3Arq-jinx-and-hiemer-skin-ideas

Not bad. not bad at all.
I think this is absolutely adorable.
